CustomField.description: Automatically rename the household name if the field(s) of any of the household member(s) specified in the Household Naming Convention changes, or if the household's members changes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically rename the household name if the field(s) of any of the household member(s) specified in the Household Naming Convention changes, or if the household's members changes.
CustomField.label: Enable Automatic Household Renaming
